Text:
function EP01_12()

    -- .転-4「姫巫女・登場」
    SaveData.Title = "姫巫女・登場"

    -- //BG：大講堂前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG026aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)

    MSG([[ The moment that girl in traditional clothing appeared――the atmosphere around us changed instantly. ]])

    --PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "I thought the entrance to the entrance ceremony was delayed, and as I suspected, you were the cause. It was the right decision to come and check on things." ]])

    -- //ウラン

    -- //CG：龍宮院ウラン登場（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa005aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Her beautiful black hair was like silk, her eyes a vivid jade green, and her skin reminiscent of pearls. What caught the eye most was the luxurious decorated haori she wore. ]])

    MSG([[ She radiated an elegant aura different from my sister’s dignified cuteness or Daria’s refined beauty. ]])

    MSG([[ Her striking appearance alone was more than enough to make one realize she was also one of the “Princesses.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Sorry for causing a stir, Uran. There was a little mix-up, and the new student accidentally tried a judo move on me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It’s because you tried forcefully to steal a kiss, isn’t it? I saw the whole thing." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "At last year’s entrance ceremony, you also groped me. Do you still remember?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Of course. Your body is exquisite, after all." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria said this without a hint of remorse. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Back then, Uran’s reactions were still fresh and innocent, a different kind of cuteness from now. Good memories." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "For me… those are memories to be abhorred." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "If you try any more outrageous behavior, this princess shrine maiden, Uran Ryuguuin, will deal with you." ]])

    MSG([[ The girl who introduced herself as Uran closed the folding fan in her hand and pointed it at Daria. ]])

    MSG([[ Behind them, many students who seemed to adore her gathered, glaring at each other in a tense, explosive atmosphere. ]])

    MSG([[ After a while of deadlock, Daria sighed as if resigned, and stood up. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Heh heh, I was just teasing the new student a little. I have no intention of making trouble with you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Sorry for teasing you, Erika. Until we meet again. Adieu<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ Waving her hand lightly, Daria entered the auditorium. Many students followed behind her, and the commotion completely settled down. ]])


    -- //CG：龍宮院ウラン登場（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa005ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Is everyone unharmed? If anyone feels unwell, please come to me." ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, Uran softened her previously stern expression. ]])

    -- //SE：慎みある声援
    PLAY_SE("SEf018.wav")

    MSG([[ Just that alone caused sighs to ripple through those around her. Looking around, all the students were captivated by Uran’s smile. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG026aa")
     -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Ugh… Princess Shrine Maiden…" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-800,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "This is bad… so precious… I can’t… it’s overwhelming…" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Uran-sama… you’re so beautiful…" ]])

    MSG([[ Some even shed tears as they soaked in the atmosphere Uran exuded in their own ways. ]])

    MSG([[ This was the exact opposite of the chaos during Daria’s appearance. It felt as if the entire area had been enveloped by Uran’s gentle aura. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf018.wav",1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    -- //BU：ヒユ（興奮鼻血）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】興奮鼻血
 "Princess Shrine Maiden Uran-sama!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Wha!? Hiyu-san!? You noticed!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】真剣鼻血
 "I woke up because the aura of a beautiful girl made my nose bleed!" ]])

    MSG([[ She reacts even without consciousness… Hiyu-san, who had fainted moments ago, forgot all about it and stared intently, practically licking her eyes over Uran’s姿. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔鼻血
 "Hyaaaah… As expected of the prestigious family of the academy’s top noble lady… just looking at her feels like it could extend my lifespan…" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Is she from such a famous family?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】興奮鼻血
 "She’s from a distinguished family dating back to the Sengoku era. A talented lady certified in ikebana, tea ceremony, traditional Japanese dance, and koto music!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "(Such a picture-perfect lady really does exist…)" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Truly a school for noble ladies. Seeing people from worlds I’d never encountered before, I felt strangely moved. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔鼻血
 "Just looking at her makes anyone feel energized… Uran-san isn’t just a healing type; she’s the embodiment of ‘healing’ as a beautiful girl!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "Among the ‘Four Princesses,’ she’s completely the opposite of the stimulating Daria." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01bb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】真剣鼻血
 "Exactly! That’s what’s great about Yuriai!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san happily began explaining. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】真剣鼻血
 "Nowadays, when you say ‘beautiful girl,’ it can mean everything from cute types to glamorous ladies, healing types, gals, cool beauties... many diverse ideals!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】真剣鼻血
 "So at Yuriai, students choose their ideal ‘beautiful girl’ to aim for. From the four beautiful girls elected in the Princess Election—the ‘Four Princesses’!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "I see. So there’s a reason why there are four princesses." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Looking closely, those who seemed to support Uran’s faction wore fashions imitating her, and the same went for Daria’s group. ]])

    MSG([[ The ‘Princesses’ function as both the academy’s leaders and the students’ role models. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_HIY01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔鼻血
 "Since middle school, I’ve decided that if I become a ‘Knight,’ it’ll be under Uran-sama!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔鼻血
 "Erika-san, won’t you become a ‘Knight’ with me? I’m sure your kimono style would suit it perfectly~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "K-Knight...? What does that mean――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔鼻血）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    RYU_PARTICLE_01(150, 600, -150 , 3000)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Good day<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    --WAIT(300)

    PLAY_SE("SEa022.wav")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01gb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】焦り鼻血
 "Hyua!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "Wah!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Before I knew it, Uran-san had approached us, pulling a handkerchief from her pocket to wipe Hiyu’s nosebleed. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】悲しみ
 "You’re bleeding. Are you sure you don’t need to go to the infirmary?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】興奮鼻血
 "I’m fine, I’m fine!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Her excitement definitely wasn’t fine. ]])

    MSG([[ Even as someone who’s not a fan, Uran-san’s feminine grace makes me dizzy. There was no way Hiyu-san, a huge fan, could stay calm. ]])

    RESET_RYU_PARTICLE(150, 500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "There’s no need to panic." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "At least the bleeding must be stopped. Now, breathe out slowly and inhale deeply." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01cb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】驚き鼻血
 "Hy-hyuaaa...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Following Uran-san’s instructions as told, Hiyu complied. Uran gently stroked her head like soothing a baby. ]])

    MSG([[ Gradually, Hiyu’s excited expression calmed down to normal. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "The bleeding has stopped, hasn’t it?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】驚き
 "Y-yes…!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Hehe, that’s good. It’d be sad to stain the precious memories of a once-in-a-lifetime entrance ceremony with blood." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔
 "Thank you very much, Uran-sama!" ]])

    MSG([[ To the delighted Hiyu, Uran returned a gentle smile. Even I, used to my sister’s beauty, was struck by her delicate loveliness. ]])

    MSG([[ That expression was undoubtedly sincere. In an academy with such kind people, what kind of incident could have befallen my sister Marika? ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "You are Erika Ikusa, correct?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Eh?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Uran turned to face me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "H-How do you know my na—why do you know my name?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Daria called you that, didn’t she?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Also, since you bear a striking resemblance to Lady Marika and wear her uniform, it’s natural to assume you’re a relative." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "(Did she overhear my conversation with Daria?)" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "(It’s going to get harder for Akira starting tomorrow… I’m sorry, Akira.)" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Lady Marika has told me much about you. As I heard, you are truly charming." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "Th-thank you…" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ In truth, I wanted to ask about what I’d heard from Marika or argue that I’m not Erika, but I had no room to do so. I did my best to appear calm and avoid suspicion. ]])

    MSG([[ Furthermore, what Uran just said unsettled me even more. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "You don’t seem well. You must be troubled about Lady Marika’s situation, aren’t you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "About Marika…!? You know something?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Yes, among the Princesses the circumstances surrounding Lady Marika are shared." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】苦笑
 "Ah, please don’t worry. I’m not the type to discuss such matters publicly before a crowd." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Publ-Publicly...? Do you mean delicacy?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Yes, delicacy<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I’m quite bad with English, you see…" ]])

    MSG([[ That part also seemed very Yamato Nadeshiko-like. ]])

    MSG([[ But that’s not the point. What’s important is the fact that some information about my sister Marika is shared among the Princesses. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "(It’d be best if I could ask Uran more details here and now.)" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ But it seemed difficult to get information in this situation. If I became fixated and aroused suspicion, it would backfire later. ]])

    MSG([[ Reluctantly, I decided to postpone getting answers and focus on getting through this moment. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG026aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_RYU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Sorry for suddenly speaking to you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "If you ever have trouble in the academy, please don’t hesitate to rely on me. Bringing smiles and joy to the students is the Princesses’ true purpose." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】笑顔
 "Welcome to Yuriai Private Academy. I hope we meet again." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔
 "Y-yes!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 "Thank you, Uran-san." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ ――Surely, I’ll never meet her like this again. Feelings of guilt simmered, but I managed to return a smile. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-800,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】通常
 "Well then, loyal followers, shall we proceed to the entrance ceremony?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran-knight_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran’s Followers】
 "Yes, Sister Uran." ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",1000,true)

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Leading her devoted students, Uran moved into the auditorium. She looked like a real princess from a period drama, walking through her castle surrounded by retainers. ]])

    MSG([[ After that, no particularly attention-grabbing students appeared, and the entrance procession continued. Finally, it was our turn to enter. ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】笑顔
 "Now it’s our turn! Let’s go, Erika-san!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "...Yes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    -- //SE： 騒ぐ声
    PLAY_SE("SEf016.wav")

    MSG([[ As we queued with the other new students, all I could think about was the Princesses we had just met. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 "(Besides Marika-san, there are two more women as beautiful as Uran and Daria...) " ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Yuriai Private Academy had more extraordinary beautiful girls than I had imagined. ]])

    MSG([[ I wonder what kinds of people the other Princesses are. What’s the situation concerning Marika-san that’s known among them? ]])

    MSG([[ What kind of life did my sister, chosen as a Princess, lead at this school? ]])

    MSG([[ There’s so much I want to know, but first, I have to get through the entrance ceremony. ]])

    MSG([[ Praying nothing else happens, I entered the auditorium with Hiyu. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
STOP_ALL_SOUND(1000)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_13")

end
